Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Lifestream
Punchline: A plugin to speed up Aethernet travel and World changing.
Description:
- One click to teleport to any world or aethernet destination
- Click on aetheryte shards inside zone map to teleport to them
Changelog:
- Added support for residential aethernet. Doing so required rework of certain core functions of the plugin; please test if there are any issues with other functions.
- Added new option: "Wait until game UI is ready before executing commands" for people who were experiencing issue with Lifestream attempting to execute commands too early.
